sentences.en: A gas in solution diffuses from region of greater to one of less concentration.
sentences.cn: 溶液中的气体由浓度较高的区域向浓度较低的区域扩散.

sentences.en: a momentary lapse of concentration
sentences.cn: 走神儿

sentences.en: a Nazi concentration camp
sentences.cn: 纳粹集中营

sentences.en: Additives are expensive but are used in very low concentrations.
sentences.cn: 添加剂很昂贵，但都以很低的浓度使用。

sentences.en: Dr. Bledsoe sat with a benign smile of inward concentration.
sentences.cn: 布莱索博士坐在椅子上,思想集中,脸上露出了一副宽厚的笑容.

sentences.en: He paused and narrowed his eyes in concentration.
sentences.cn: 他停下来，眯起眼睛专注地看着。

sentences.en: He plays the character with tremendous concentration combined with a pleasing modesty.
sentences.cn: 他表演这个角色时倾注了巨大的心血，而且非常谦虚和善。

sentences.en: I had a little lapse of concentration in the middle of the race.
sentences.cn: 我在比赛中途一时走神。

sentences.en: I lost my concentration and fell asleep.
sentences.cn: 我精神一放松就睡着了。

sentences.en: Lack of concentration was a real problem.
sentences.cn: 注意力不集中是个大问题。

sentences.en: pH is a measure of the concentration of free hydrogen atoms in a solution.
sentences.cn: pH值是测试溶液中自由氢原子浓度的单位。

sentences.en: She needed all her powers of concentration to stop herself from slipping on the icy road.
sentences.cn: 她需要集中全部注意力才能不让自己在结冰的路上滑倒。

sentences.en: She wrinkled her brows in concentration.
sentences.cn: 她蹙额皱眉,陷入沉思.

sentences.en: The area has one of the world's greatest concentrations of wildlife.
sentences.cn: 该地区有世界上野生生物最集中的区域之一。

sentences.en: the concentration of greenhouse gases in the atmosphere
sentences.cn: 大气中温室气体的积聚

sentences.en: This book requires a great deal of concentration.
sentences.cn: 这本书需要全神贯注才能读懂。

sentences.en: This concentration of airborne firepower wrought havoc with the enemy forces.
sentences.cn: 这次机载火力的集中攻击给敌军造成很大破坏.

sentences.en: This is a novel depicting the bitter sufferings of the inmates in a Nazi concentration camp.
sentences.cn: 这是一本描写关押在纳粹集中营的人受苦受难的小说.

sentences.en: This is not always true - as with the manufacture of pig iron and steel from low - grade iron ores - but it did lead to the concentration of industrial developments on the coal fields.
sentences.cn: 并非一概如此 — 例如从低级铁矿石中生产生铁和钢材的情况一但是这导致了工业发展集中在煤田上.

sentences.en: Total concentration is required with no distractions.
sentences.cn: 要全神贯注，不能有丝毫分神。

sentences.en: With great concentration she went through the movements.
sentences.cn: 她聚精会神地做完这些动作.

words.tran_cn: 集中的；浓缩的；全神贯注的
集中；浓缩；全神贯注；聚集
[物][化学]浓度；集中；浓缩；专心；集合

trans.tran_en: the ability to think about something carefully or for a long time
